meanings.definition: A small, dark-colored cockroach commonly found in homes and buildings.
meanings.sent1: I saw a crotonbug scurrying across the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent2: The crotonbug hid behind the refrigerator when the lights turned on.
meanings.sent3: The crotonbug thought it was invited to the picnic, but the humans disagreed.
meanings.sent4: The crotonbug darted through the shadows like a tiny ninja.
meanings.sent5: The crotonbug's tiny legs moved so fast, it seemed to blur in the dim light.

meanings.definition: To infest or be infested with crotonbugs.
meanings.sent1: Our old apartment was crotonbug-infested, and it was hard to get rid of them.
meanings.sent2: If you leave food out, you might crotonbug your whole house!
meanings.sent3: The crotonbugs decided to throw a party in the pantry, much to the dismay of the residents.
meanings.sent4: The idea of failure seemed to crotonbug his mind, making him doubt every decision.
meanings.sent5: The fear of failure crotonbugged her dreams, making her wake up in a cold sweat.
